## Reproducibility & Data Science in R

::: incremental
-   Offered every fall by application only
-   Topics covered include:
    -   Organizing a research compendium
    -   Reproducible reports & manuscripts
    -   Version control with git and GitHub
    -   Data wrangling and programming with R
    -   Archiving data and code
:::
